title: Is Micron Technology a good stock to invest in? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let me stick my neck out on that and say no not at this time. It has allot of potential but to much risk with it. I believe it or not actually sold it after only having it for 3 days and seeing this stocks potential downside. It even on Zach's ranked stock list is a 5 strong sell so that only confirmed I sold it and made a good decision.
I looked on line and The Motley Fool says it is. Quite strongly I might add. I found this information by asking Google. You would get much better advice from Google than fron me.
